osvSchema.details: Arbitrary file upload vulnerability in ROS (Robot Operating System) Melodic Morenia in ROS_VERSION 1 and ROS_PYTHON_VERSION 3, allows attackers to execute arbitrary code, cause a denial of service (DoS), and obtain sensitive information via the file upload component.

description_data.value: Arbitrary file upload vulnerability in ROS (Robot Operating System) Melodic Morenia in ROS_VERSION 1 and ROS_PYTHON_VERSION 3, allows attackers to execute arbitrary code, cause a denial of service (DoS), and obtain sensitive information via the file upload component.

descriptions.value: Arbitrary file upload vulnerability in ROS (Robot Operating System) Melodic Morenia in ROS_VERSION 1 and ROS_PYTHON_VERSION 3, allows attackers to execute arbitrary code, cause a denial of service (DoS), and obtain sensitive information via the file upload component.

Vulnerabilidad de carga arbitraria de archivos en ROS (Robot Operating System) Melodic Morenia en ROS_VERSION 1 y ROS_PYTHON_VERSION 3, permite a atacantes ejecutar código arbitrario, provocar una denegación de servicio (DoS) y obtener información confidencial a través del componente de carga de archivos.
